reviewText:
The house of smile is the name of a residence of aged people in which Adeline decides to get into. Until this moment, her existence was grey and pale hovered by hopeless. But suddenly appears the flame of love; a handsome and elegant man; that incredible situation triggers all kind of adverse comments inside and outside the residence. The prejudices against this unexpected affair are the bitter platform through Ferreri will focus his incisive and cynical gaze.

This picture was awarded in Berlin with the Golden Bear as Best Film in 1991. And once you watch it you'll know the reason why.
